A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a disappointment!  Not only was this movie terrible\, but it even managed to ruin some of the prior movies for me.  I actually quite liked Episode VII.  Sure\, it was a bit of a rehash of Episode IV\, but I really liked the new characters and there was a ton of promise at the end.  Lots of interesting ways they could have gone.  But THIS is where they went with it?!  I actually find myself disliking Episode VII now.  This one is so poorly written and poorly edited\, with no regard whatsoever for the franchise\, that they've probably killed it.  Just a complete hash of a movie.  I have no idea how so many critics could possibly like it.  Unless\, I suppose\, they just don't like Star Wars generally.  If you hate Star Wars\, you might like this one.
